name: uninitiated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having knowledge or experience of a particular subject or activity: The author's goal was to introduce uninitiated readers to the area. To the uninitiated outsider, all this would be completely incomprehensible.
More examplesFewer examplesAn uninitiated observer might not have known that anything unusual was happening.I found myself receiving strange looks from uninitiated onlookers. The world of hospitals and doctors has its own language, which she translates for the uninitiated reader.

people who are without knowledge or experience of a particular subject or activity: Michelle, for the uninitiated, is the central female character in Netflix's latest comedy series.
